snippet: DirecTV, which has previously broadcast shows including "Damages" and "Friday Night Lights" that it shared with or inherited from other networks, has commissioned its first original series, "Rogue," starring Thandie Newton as an emotionally...
abstract: DirecTV, which has previously broadcast shows including "Damages" and "Friday Night Lights" that it shared with or inherited from other networks, has commissioned its first original series, "Rogue," starring Thandie Newton as an emotionally conflicted police officer.

headline.main: DirecTV to Produce Original Series, 'Rogue,' Starring Thandie Newton
headline.print_headline: DirecTV to Produce An Original Series
